article.title: Trump leaves G7 to focus on Mideast conflict. And, Vance Boelter faces federal charges
article.description: Trump left the G7 summit early to focus on the rapidly escalating conflict between Israel and Iran. And, the man suspected of killing a Minnesota state lawmaker faces federal murder charges.
article.content: Trump left the G7 summit early to focus on the rapidly escalating conflict between Israel and Iran. And, the man suspected of killing a Minnesota state lawmaker faces federal murder charges.
article.author: Suzanne Nuyen

rewritten.title: Trump Ditches G7 Early: A New Chapter in Israel-Iran Feud and a Deadly Crime in Minnesota
rewritten.rewritten: In a surprising twist, Trump decided to bid his early adieu to the G7 summit, turning his focus instead on the fast-rising tensions between Israel and Iran. It's like leaving a party to stop a bar fight - stressful, but somehow necessary. Meanwhile, in Minnesota, a man's heinous crime has landed him in hot federal water, as he's suspected of killing a state lawmaker. Like a dark subplot in a gritty crime novel, this real-life case has left many shocked and seeking justice.
rewritten.summary: Trump exits G7 summit prematurely to address Israel-Iran conflict, while a suspect in Minnesota faces federal murder charges for allegedly killing a state lawmaker.
